```{r}
library(K3Reviews)
files <- collect_files()
files
```

Load the discography of K3:

```{r}
df <- K3Reviews::get_discography()
```

Show the first entries:

```{r}
knitr::kable(head(df))
```

How many songs?

```{r}
n_songs <- nrow(df)
```

From this discography, one concludes that K3 has `r n_songs` tracks.
